segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the woman hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the drain is clogged or if the faucet is just left on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting wider, and it's going to cause a lot of damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the dishes stacked near the sink, waiting to be washed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to have a lot of cleaning up to do.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water streaming down the cabinet doors, ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone is going to slip and fall because of the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this situation is getting out of hand quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
